channel.title: Installation on Service Catalog Tools Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on Service Catalog Tools Workshop

item.title: Service Catalog Factory
item.description: Create a new AWS CloudFormation stack Select the AWS CloudFormation Service. If you are installing Service Catalog Puppet it will need to be installed into the same account as Service Catalog Factory. Select ‘Create Stack’ Service Catalog Factory can be installed via a pre-created AWS CloudFormation template stored in Amazon S3 under the following URL: https://service-catalog-tools.s3.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/factory/latest/servicecatalog-factory-initialiser.template.yaml Paste this URL under ‘Amazon S3 URL’: Hit Next Specify Stack details Specify the Stack details as follows: Stack Name: factory-initialization-stack You should fill in the details depending on which source code management system you want to use:
